Text.Page:
The fangspawn population is getting out of control. They're burning everything they meet! You are authorized to hunt down {@LinkCreature:29#1041#woodland fangspawns} and {@LinkCreature:29#1051#hellmouth fangspawns}.

Report to Kendara when mission is complete.
Your hard work pays off, <PCNAME>. We can use more soldiers like you.
Apologies, but without proof of death, payments aren't authorized.
